TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1629
TEI.2.document_title: W. Sutherland to Stephen F. Austin, 04-12-1827

barker_notes.barker_summary: Walter Sutherland to Austin, April 12, 1827. Land.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1629

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Walter Sutherland to Austin, April 12, 1827. Land.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*R Bravo*/location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="04-12-1827"> April the 12 1827*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Sir I send a few lines to you to enquire how affairs are with *person_mentioned*Singleton */person_mentioned*respecting his *location_mentioned*land */location_mentioned*whether he holds *location_mentioned*all of the land between *person_mentioned*Fisher*/person_mentioned*s League and *person_mentioned*Car*/person_mentioned*s League*/location_mentioned* or not And whether he is competent to transfer it away as he has bound himself and wishes to receive the pay for it I should wish to know whether I may depend on any *location_mentioned*part of that tract*/location_mentioned* and if not that I may know it I have paid him for *location_mentioned*one quarter of a League adjoining *person_mentioned*Fisher*/person_mentioned*s League*/location_mentioned* for which the bond more clearly shows I send you the bond to show that he may not deed it away to any other person. Please to give me some information by *person_mentioned*Mr Arnold*/person_mentioned* that I may know what to do*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Walter Sutherland*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
